//Generated by BehavEd

rem ( "comment" );

affect ( "aabase", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	loop ( -1 )
	{
		rotate ( < 0.000 30.000 0.000 >, 1000.000 );
		wait ( 2000.000 );
		rotate ( < 0.000 0.000 0.000 >, 1000.000 );
		wait ( 2000.000 );
		rotate ( < 0.000 -30.000 0.000 >, 1000.000 );
		wait ( 2000.000 );
	}

}
